Kuping yang terinspirasi dengan YB Salleh Ali itu ingin membantu Lobak untuk memikat seorang gadis bernama Mastura.

programme.title: Estet
programme.desc: Mengisahkan para pekerja estet Cinta Manis yang bakal bertarung dengan kumpulan estet Red Cobra dalam satu perlawanan bola sepak yang sudah 20 tahun tidak diadakan. Farid dan Shashi, dua pekerja estet yang berkawan sejak kecil, menjadi harapan pekerja estet yang lain untuk menyelamatkan penindasan yang dilakukan oleh kerani estet, Pooniah. Seorang gadis cantik bernama Geetha tertarik hati dengan Farid dan Shashi. Sesi latihan dikendalikan oleh Subramaniam iaitu bapa Geetha yang dilantik sebagai jurulatih. Ayah kepada Shashi, Apaa, adalah pemain bola yang sangat mahir, tetapi telah berlaku insiden semasa perlawanan bola sepak estet itu dahulu yang mana kakinya patah diterjah oleh Junna, seorang samseng estet yang sengaja ingin menamatkan karier Apaa atas upahan Pooniah 20 tahun yang lalu. Berjayakah Farid dan Shashi serta kawan-kawannya membebaskan pekerja estet Cinta Manis daripada penindasan Pooniah?

programme.title: Ekspresi
programme.desc: Mengisahkan seorang kanak-kanak bernama Awi yang kurang mendapat kasih sayang daripada ibu bapanya yang sibuk bekerja. Awi sering bergaul dengan budak-budak nakal di sekitar rumahnya. Keadaan menjadi semakin keruh setelah Awi mengetahui bahawa dia merupakan anak angkat dan bakal mendapat adik baru. Hal ini telah membuatkan Awi semakin memberontak sehingga dia cuba untuk membunuh ahli keluarganya.

programme.title: Darah Satria
programme.desc: Filem yang menceritakan tentang tugas anggota angkatan tentera dan pengorbanan yang mereka lakukan demi negara yang tercinta, lakonan Aman Shah sebagai Leftenan Muda Rejimen Askar Melayu Di Raja.

programme.title: Anak Bapak
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Hisyam yang menjaga bapanya yang mengalami masalah sering lupa. Pada suatu hari, Hisyam berang kerana bapanya telah membuat sesuatu yang menyebabkan huru hara di pejabatnya. Bapanya sedih dengan kejadian itu dan berjanji tidak akan mengulanginya. Kemudian, Hisyam menghidapi sejenis penyakit yang boleh membawa maut dan membuatkan bapanya pula mengambil alih tugas untuk menjaga Hisyam.

programme.title: Imigran
programme.desc: Faridah, pekerja warga asing terlibat dalam kes jenayah apabila telah menjadi saksi kes pembunuhan. Bertemu Hisham ketika cuba melarikan diri, mereka berdua mula jatuh cinta selepas menghabiskan masa bersama di kampung Hisham. Konflik berlaku apabila penjenayah tersilap menculik orang yang menyebabkan Faridah dan Hisham perlu melakukan sesuatu untuk menyelamatkan Azura.

programme.title: Anak Sarawak

programme.desc: Tepat jam 6 pagi, seorang bayi perempuan yang sihat diletakkan di tangan Fiza, bayi itu terus diam saat dipeluk Fiza, dan saat itulah Fiza menjadi seorang ibu. Ayah Fiza tidak dapat menerima kenyataan apabila mendapat tahu anak perempuannya, Fiza yang masih bersekolah mengandung dan lahirkan anak luar nikah .

Namun sejak memiliki smartphone, Pak Ali banyak sertai group whatsapp rakan-rakan sekolah lama. Melalui group whatsapp Pak Ali telah berkenalan dengan Martina, gadis kacukan.

programme.title: Misteri Akil Balik
programme.desc: Kemunculan Akil di kampung halamannya semula telah menimbulkan persoalan orang kampung. Malah mereka merasakan sejak adanya Akil di kampung itu pelbagai perkara misteri berlaku. Terutamanya dua orang pemuda kampung yang nakal iaitu Oden dan Ucop kerana mereka merasakan sejak Akil muncul, Hani, Hanim dan Hanum sering tergila-gilakan Akil. Mereka berdua rasa tergugat.

programme.title: Missing You

programme.desc: Mengisahkan Sahira, yang hidupnya terkongkong dalam mengejar ilmu keduniaan. Sahira tidak berpeluang untuk hidup bersosial dengan rakan sebaya. Adakah Sahira akan terus dikongkong?

programme.title: Senjakala Di Manado
programme.desc: Johny WW Lengkong (Ray Sahetapy), seorang pelaut yang telah meninggalkan keluarganya selama hampir 20 tahun, berniat kembali ke Manado dengan harapan keluarganya mau memaafkannya. Namun ternyata istrinya telah meninggal dunia dan meninggalkan seorang anak bernama Pingkan (Mikha Tambayong). Johny pun berjanji akan merawat Pingkan, tetapi ternyata semua tidak berjalan dengan mudah. Pingkan merasa terganggu tatkala Johny mulai mencampuri urusan asmaranya dengan Brando (Fero Walandouw), kekasihnya, lantaran Johny merasa Brando bukan pria baik-baik. Dari situlah konflik antara ayah dan anak mulai terjadi.

programme.title: Pad Thai
programme.desc: Petchara, seorang penjual pad thai di pasar, menyertai pertandingan makan Pad-thai untuk memenangi harga satu juta baht. Dia mempunyai ramai pesaing yang bersedia untuk menang. Salah seorang daripada mereka ialah bekas teman lelakinya, Surachart, yang tidak mahu kehilangannya lagi. Dan Suchat, seorang guru muda yang merupakan jirannya yang mempunyai ramai peminat di kampungnya dan ramai pemuda top di kampungnya adalah tip untuk memenangi pertandingan ini. Perlumbaan untuk mencapai kemenangan bukanlah mudah.

programme.title: Nang Eye
programme.desc: Ini adalah kisah seorang gadis muda yang pergi ke sekolah biara di luar negara. Dia sangatgembira, suka bermain dan kadang-kadang agak berani.

programme.title: Restu Ayah
programme.desc: Kisah Azlan yang terlalu dimanjakan ibu bapanya, sehinggakan sifatnya yang suka dipuji terbawa di dalam kehidupan sehariannya bersama jiran-jiran dan juga di sekolah. Kebahagiaan ini dapat dilihat di rumah dan disekolah apabila segala aktiviti serta kelakuan Azlan yang suka menuntut pujian itu disenangi oleh kawan-kawan serta guru dan ibu bapanya. Situasi ini menjadikan Azlan seorang yang sering diberi tumpuan oleh kawan-kawan, guru, jiran-jiran dan ibu bapanya.

programme.title: Destiny of Us Ep9
programme.desc: Apabila Narin jatuh dari air terjun dan hilang, Nares pulang ke Thailand untuk mencari abangnya dan mengurus 'Nara Resort'. Di sana, dia bertemu Sine, cinta pertamanya yang kini menjadi pembantu Narin. Khabar angin mengatakan Sine adalah isteri rahsia Narin, mengecewakan Nares, tetapi mereka bekerjasama mencari Narin. Ketika Sine hampir terbunuh, mereka curiga kehilangan Narin mungkin dirancang. Bersama, mereka berusaha mengungkap kebenaran, membuka pintu kepada cinta yang tidak disengajakan.

programme.title: D'Koplo Ep20
programme.desc: D'Koplo (Musim 1) merupakan persembahan bakat nyanyian koplo dangdut pertama dari D'Koplo 2023. Juri utama musim ini terdiri daripada Soimah, Nassar, Dewi Perssik, dan Nita Thalia. Ada juga beberapa juri jempotan yang akan hadir.

programme.title: Hidayah Cinta Ep19
programme.desc: Gia dianggap pembawa malang sejak lahir dan dijodohkan dengan Aslam yang terkena kutukan Mata Jahat. Masalah demi masalah berlaku selepas perkahwinan mereka. Aslam tidak mencintai Gia kerana hatinya hanya untuk Rati, bekas tunangan yang sangat disayanginya.

programme.title: Doyan Makan Ep36

programme.title: Plis Genjreng Hatiku Dong Mas

programme.desc: D'Academy Asia dengan slogan "Suara Sejati Asia" adalah pertandingan menyanyi dangdut tingkat Asia. Negara berikutnya yang akan bergabung dalam DA Asia 6 adalah Trkiye! Bersiaplah menjadi bintang dangdut terbesar di Asia!

programme.title: Bidadari Surgamu Ep20
programme.desc: Menceritakan kisah seorang gadis bernama Sakinah yang menjalani kehidupan penuh tekanan akibat fitnah dan dipaksa untuk berkahwin dengan seseorang yang tidak mencintainya. Tidak hanya itu, Sakinah juga dihalang untuk mengetahui siapa ibu kandungnya yang tega membuangnya.

programme.title: Pencarian Cinta Ande-Ande Lumut
programme.desc: Sekar menyamar, selepas terperangkap dalam konflik keluarga akibat tuduhan rasuah terhadap bapanya. Semasa menyelamatkan seorang jurugambar kaya bernama Andre, Sekar kehilangan rantai lehernya. Bersembunyi di rumah Puan Narsih, dia menghadapi ketidaksetujuan daripada anak-anaknya. Sementara itu, Andre mencari keberadaan Sekar, membawa konflik yang tidak dijangka.

programme.title: Infotainment Awards 2023
programme.desc: Infotainment Awards 2023 adalah acara penganugerahan yang dianjurkan oleh Surya Citra Media untuk menghargai selebriti dalam dunia infotainment.

programme.title: Konser Para Juara Ep2
programme.desc: Para penyanyi yang memiliki kualiti yang baik telah dilahirkan dengan terpilih sebagai pemenang dalam pelbagai pertandingan dangdut. Kini kesemua pemenang telah berkumpul di satu pentas untuk mempersembahkan konsert yang ditunggu-tunggu oleh pencinta dangdut Indonesia. Saksikan Konser Para Juara yang dimeriahkan oleh pemenang terpilih dari D'Academy dan LIDA.

programme.title: Satu Cinta Dua Hati Ep36
programme.desc: Rumah tangga Salwa dan Fahri dikurniakan dua cahaya mata iaitu Nayla dan Arsya. Perkahwinan yang pada asalnya penuh kebahagiaan kini berakhir dengan duka apabila Fahri memutuskan untuk meninggalkan keluarganya bagi merantau ke bandar demi mengejar kejayaan. Dalam usaha menyara kedua anaknya, Salwa bekerja keras setelah ditinggalkan suaminya. Namun, keamanan keluarga kecil ini diganggu oleh peristiwa besar yang berlaku di rumah mereka.

programme.title: Merajut Gorontalo Ep5
programme.desc: Separa dokumentari yang menerokai tradisi masakan Gorontalo yang pelbagai dan unik. Program ini menampilkan hidangan tradisional, cara penyediaan yang asli, dan budaya masakan tempatan di daerah Gorontalo.

programme.title: Bidadari Surgamu Ep21
programme.desc: Menceritakan kisah seorang gadis bernama Sakinah yang menjalani kehidupan penuh tekanan akibat fitnah dan dipaksa untuk berkahwin dengan seseorang yang tidak mencintainya. Tidak hanya itu, Sakinah juga dihalang untuk mengetahui siapa ibu kandungnya yang tega membuangnya.

programme.title: Babe Angel's Cinta Lama Damagenya Warbiyasak
programme.desc: Babe Somad telah diculik. Tugas Babe Angel iaitu Juleha, Nisa, dan Mala adalah untuk mencari Babe Somad. Sementara itu, Juleha bertemu dengan Bian, bekas kekasih yang masih disayanginya, yang turut serta dalam misi pencarian Babe Somad.

programme.title: The Inheritors Season 3 Ep12
programme.desc: Intangible Cultural Heritage refers to the behavior or performance which is important for cultural inheritance in a certain district, such as folk custom, culture, beliefs, traditions, etc. As the theme of this program, the results of protection of intangible cultural heritage could be demonstrated and promoted comprehensively.

programme.title: Rap Star Dream Maker (Repackaged) Ep2
programme.desc: Jay Chou gathered Will Liu, Dylan Wang, and four label managers GAI & Bridge, MC Jin, Xiao Gui, Air & Zao An, VaVa, and D-SHINE, they provide escort and support for the new generation of rap artists in their dream pursuit journey. Breaking from the traditional mentor-led model, they established true mentor-mentee relationships to co-create unique rap labels, and aim to inspire rapper creativity through competitive performances to find the next rap superstar.

programme.title: Travel With The Royal Family Ep4
programme.desc: Reunited for the first time in thirteen years were Ada Choi, Tao Xin-ran, Xi Lan, Zhang Xiao-long, Lan Ying-ying, Chen Si-si, and Yang Jiu-lang. Beginning from Daguanyuan in Beijing, the filming location of the top-leading drama "Empresses in the Palace", they traveled to various ethnic cultural origins. Through in-depth exploration and study, they experienced the local customs and culture, carrying with them both nostalgic memories and new aspirations, completing their "Rejuvenation Journey" across China.

programme.desc: Perfect Match is getting back to the classic rules. The male guests will meet and understand the 24 female guests through the sections of answering, judging and selecting. The big data will also help to suggest one of the female guests who are matched. Chen Ming and Huang Lan will join the show and help to interpret love from a new perspective.

programme.title: Talk With Famous Doctors Ep12
programme.desc: The program focuses new research and development of interactive health science popularization plan; from "treatment" to "prevention", increase the in-depth popularization of medical and health knowledge.

programme.title: The Foodie Journey Season 2 Ep16
programme.desc: Chinese food culture is vast and profound, with each region having its own signature dishes. Everyone has different memories associated with food. This program explores the stories behind delicious food and preserves Chinese culinary culture.

programme.title: New Blood In Intangible Heritage Season 2 Ep1
programme.desc: A series of micro-documentaries mentioning thousands of years of cultural context, record the rejuvenation stories of traditional intangible cultural heritage, and listen to the voice of the times of the inheritance of youth. It preserves and captures the spiritual and splendid Chinese civilization to all over the world.

programme.desc: Gourmet food as the media of the new cultural interview program, each episode invited cultural celebrities, celebrity chefs, foreign handsome men, live network red and folk gourmets guests together to visit the meal, in tasting folk delicious at the same time, share the life story.

programme.title: Tenday Ep6
programme.desc: 39 well-known competitors from a variety of industries, including Nicky Wu, Michelle Chen, Neo Hou, Lin Gengxin, and Shen Yue, are invited to participate in an immersive survival reality TV series. The show involves living in a real metropolis for 10 straight days in a closed-off setting. They will encounter tasks that will put their cooperation, mental, physical, and psychological faculties to the test. The champion will be the ultimate victor.

programme.title: Tea in China Ep2
programme.desc: An in-depth visit to the most representative country of origin of Chinese tea. Travelling to various places and recording nearly a hundred of tea specialists, to interpret the tea from a new perspective and explore the most authentic taste of tea. The persistence of tea specialists would finally be shown.

programme.title: Warm Inn Ep5
programme.desc: The host Jiang Mengjie runs a "Warm Inn" which is located in the Jiangnan countryside and far away from the city. She invites a celebrity guest and their friends to visit her in each episode. Guests in the village can have a new exploration experience and immerse themselves in a different kind of Jiangnan. They are assisting with rural revitalization and enjoying a warm healing journey together.

programme.title: Pet Doctor Season 2 Ep5
programme.desc: This program records all kinds of cute pets, showing warmth and healing and professionalism to convey warmth, easier to connect and understand with sincerity. Lets have a new understanding of pet doctors.

programme.title: The Charm of Jiangsu You’re Never Known Ep5
programme.desc: Led by Meng Fei, an exploration team is embarking on a journey through the province of Jiangsu in China. Comprised of academic experts, cultural celebrities, and exceptional local youth, their mission is to delve into the fascinating towns, unearthing the rich history and cultural significance that lies within. The initiative aims to attract more tourists to Jiangsu and allow them to experience the "flavorful life."

programme.title: 90’s Dating Agency Season 2 Ep9
programme.desc: Meng Fei is continuously to be invited as the host, formed with Gillian Chung, Xu Yiyang, and Han Zhuo as Love Consultants, for advising 8 young ladies and gentlemen to participate dating event. Special accommodation arrangement will be provided if two parties are successfully matched. What a romantic dating opportunities!

programme.title: Travel With The Royal Family Ep4
programme.desc: Reunited for the first time in thirteen years were Ada Choi, Tao Xin-ran, Xi Lan, Zhang Xiao-long, Lan Ying-ying, Chen Si-si, and Yang Jiu-lang. Beginning from Daguanyuan in Beijing, the filming location of the top-leading drama "Empresses in the Palace", they traveled to various ethnic cultural origins. Through in-depth exploration and study, they experienced the local customs and culture, carrying with them both nostalgic memories and new aspirations, completing their "Rejuvenation Journey" across China.

programme.desc: Six comedians from Northeast China, Jian Jun Tang, Xiaoli Wang, Bing Yang, Song Wen, Tianwa and Yunpeng Zhou, are invited to join the first Northeast characteristic comedy detective variety show. programme.title: Let's Go, Lovely Pets Ep2
programme.desc: Pets, led by their "Pet Parent," travel to Shanghai, Dali, and Shenzhen, showcasing diverse pet travel experiences. programme.title: Rap Star Dream Maker (Repackaged) Ep3
programme.desc: Jay Chou gathered Will Liu, Dylan Wang, and four label managers GAI & Bridge, MC Jin, Xiao Gui, Air & Zao An, VaVa, and D-SHINE, they provide escort and support for the new generation of rap artists in their dream pursuit journey. programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep128
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3440
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: New Taiwan Go (M) Ep2982
programme.desc: Depth analysis of the day breaking news headlines to restore the truth inside

programme.title: Walker Fun Kaohsiung (M) Ep221222
programme.desc: Walker Fun Kaohsiung is a travel reality show that takes viewers on an exciting journey through the vibrant city of Kaohsiung. With 35 different routes, the show explores the citys hidden gems, local culture, and unique experiences. From bustling night markets to serene temples, Walker Fun Kaohsiung showcases the best of Kaohsiung.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep25
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Taichung Player (M) Ep5758
programme.desc: The vibrant Chin-Lan Chang hosts a captivating journey through Taichung's cultural and creative industries, unique attractions, community initiatives, local arts, and heartfelt human stories. This show offers a rich blend of fun and learning, ensuring every moment is both enjoyable and enlightening.

programme.title: Top Singers (T) Ep636
programme.desc: The show 'Top Singers' aims to spotlight outstanding Taiwanese singers and composers, setting a new standard in the industry. Combining elements of competition, variety, and personal stories, the show welcomes participants of all ages. Its goals include discovering grassroots talent, innovating Taiwanese song performance styles, and involving more local talent in song composition to infuse new life into Taiwanese music.

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep968
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: Dear Mom (M) Ep23
programme.desc: Feng-Yi Li handles everything in the house while her husband, Shu-An, lounges and daydreams. She constantly worries about the love lives of their four daughters. Yi-Wan starts a relationship with a gang leaders son despite claiming to have never dated. Qing-Qing may be having an affair with a married man. Xiao-Xi is infatuated with the school team captain but is unaware of "the others." An-Qing returns from the US with her son after a failed marriage. When Feng-Yi suddenly disappears, the sisters realize they've neglected their mother, who has always supported them. Now they must find her and get their lives back on track.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1057
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep513
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: A Hint of You (M) Ep6465
programme.desc: As the chef and owner of "All One Hundred" stir-fry restaurant, Ching-Yo Xia is determined to recreate the delicious fried rice her father used to make. To achieve this, she hones her culinary skills by learning from Master Chef Zhai-Yu Fu of a high-end teppanyaki restaurant. Despite her resilience and fearlessness in the face of challenges, Ching-Yo somehow manages to turn Culinary Prince Zhai-Yu's graceful life upside down!

There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: iWalker (M) Ep59
programme.desc: iWalker is a TV program which introduce food and attractive places to audience.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1947
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep129
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep4951
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: The Narrow Road
programme.desc: Chak, a small cleaning company owner, hits tough times during the pandemic. In need of an assistant, he hires a young single mother Candy, who unexpectedly helps him solve many difficulties at work. While life seems to get back on track, a series of cruel realities happen again, but they still bond together to support each other on the narrow road.

programme.title: Invisible Target
programme.desc: Three young police officers driven by different motives decide to join forces to defeat Tien and his lethal, mercenary gang. As they team up to prevent another massive robbery, they discover that it is instigated by another unknown man. With courage, wits and dexterity, the trio are determined to not let Tien and the instigator escape.

programme.title: Everything Under Control
programme.desc: During a diamond heist, one of the security escorts, Jelly, steals the diamonds and flees. Fellow security escorts, Yau Shing and Penguin, are forced to help the robber track down the diamonds. They stumble onto a remote village along the way, encountering strange villagers and mysterious incidents. Can they finally locate Jelly and the diamonds?

programme.title: The Monkey King
programme.desc: After Goddess Nuwa sacrifices herself to save the mortal world, Monkey King comes into being from one of her crystals. Powerful and uncontrollable, Monkey King challenges the Jade Emperor and causes an uproar in heaven, unwittingly creating an opportunity for the wicked Buffalo Demon King to wage war in heaven.

programme.title: All U Need is Love
programme.desc: Ten major film companies join forces on a comedy-drama film to raise funds and create jobs for industry workers during the COVID-19 pandemic. This film features an all-star ensemble cast starring for free, with the story revolving around a group of hotel guests placed under quarantine in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Love After Love
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is adapted from Eileen Changs first short story. Set in 1930s, Wei Long travels to Hong Kong from Shanghai to pursue her education. Struggling financially, she asks her aunt to help pay for tuition but ends up being her aunts puppet to lure rich men. When Wei Long falls for playboy, George, she sinks into a life of depravity.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs II
programme.desc: In this prequel, the secrets of Infernal Affairs are revealed - the resentment between police superintendent Wong and crime boss Sam, as well as the beginning of the parallel fates of the two moles, Yan and Ming. The keys lie in the hands of Sam's wife, a ruthless kingpin and a righteous cop.

programme.title: One Second
programme.desc: Directed by renowned director Zhang Yimou, the film is set during the Cultural Revolution, where a common man escapes a labour camp to find a newsreel that captures his daughter for one second in a movie. On the way, he encounters an orphan who also seeks the movie reel. Can the man finally pass the reel to a projectionist and screen the movie?

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon II: Wild Wild Bunch
programme.desc: Starring four Hong Kong Film Awards Best Actors, Simon Yam, Louis Koo, Tony Leung Ka Fai and Gordon Lam, this action-thriller follows the real-life kidnapping events that terrorized Hong Kongs elite in the 1990s by serial billionaire-kidnapper Logan and his gang.

programme.title: Legally Declared Dead
programme.desc: Insurance agent Sean visits Tak and Ling's home to follow up on a case and is shocked to see their son's corpse hanging above him. He suspects them of murdering their son to claim the insurance money and decides to launch his own investigation. As he becomes obsessed over their guilt, his kind nature is used against him by the real perpetrator.

programme.title: Wusong VS Ximenqing
programme.desc: Wu Song finds out about his sister-in-laws affair with a rich man, Ximen Qing. Qing sets Song up and have him exiled for a year, during which his hapless brother is murdered and cremated. When Song finally returns home, he takes the case to court but the judge brushes it aside and closes it abruptly. Can Song finally avenge his brothers death?

programme.title: Band Four
programme.desc: An aspiring singer of an indie band called Band Four reunites with her estranged guitarist father following the death of her mother. Together with her half-sister and her nine-year-old son, the newly reunited family come together to support each other through their love and passion for music.

programme.title: Raging Fire
programme.desc: As the police sets to arrest a drug lord, a team of masked thugs steals the drugs and murders the cops. Inspector Bong is devastated to see the aftermath of the carnage and soon discovers that the killers are led by Ngo, a former fellow cop who was forced into a life of crime by him. As the two men meet again, it is time to settle the score

programme.title: Knockout
programme.desc: A former boxing champion and convict who has just been released from prison discovers that his wife has died and he is now a single parent. The situation is made worse with his daughters diagnosis of leukaemia. In order to encourage his daughter and fulfil his promise of never giving up, he re-enters the boxing ring.

programme.title: S Storm
programme.desc: ICAC officer Luk witnesses a suspects murder while investigating an illegal soccer gambling case, but is unable to disclose information to Chief Inspector Lau due to his code of confidentiality, thereby hindering Laus investigation. While starting the case with mutual distrust, they end up reaching a rapport to uproot the crime syndicate.

programme.title: Young Ip Man: Crisis Time
programme.desc: Set in 1917, young Ip Man pursues his studies in Hong Kong. The school is held hostage on the day of an English speech competition, and as Ip Man decides to step up and fight the crisis, it is revealed that his master and his childhood friend are behind all this. Can he take them down and uphold justice?

programme.title: The Wandering Earth II
programme.desc: In this prequel, humans build enormous engines on the Earths surface to find a new home when the sun is burning out. In the dangerous universe, a group of young people has to step forward once again to fight in the critical battle to save the Earth.

programme.title: Bounty Hunters
programme.desc: A group of bounty hunters, including San, Yo, Cat, Swan and Bobo, are tasked to track down the culprit of a series of bombings that have plagued an international hotel group. Unfortunately, Swan, Cat and Bobo are kidnapped by the mastermind of the bombings. Can San and Yo save them? Will the bounty hunters accomplish their mission?

programme.title: One More Chance
programme.desc: Chow Yun Fat stars as a down-on-his-luck gambler, Water, whose ex-girlfriend asked him to take care of their autistic son. As Water lives with his son, he soon finds his goal in life. When he discovers his sons talent in running, Water decides to give up his dissipated life and support his son to achieve his dream.

programme.title: The Grand Grandmaster
programme.desc: Ma Fei Lung, a Chinese martial arts grandmaster, lost everything after he is floored by a former female boxing champion, Chan Tsang. The relevant video was posted on social media and he became the laughing stock of everyone. To reclaim his reputation, Fei Lung challenges Chan Tsang to a rematch. Who will be the winner?

programme.title: A Witness out of the Blue
programme.desc: The police suspects that a jewel thief, found dead in his unit with all stolen goods missing, is killed by his gang leader. They also found the crime to be related to a jewel robbery many months ago, with the robbers involved being killed off one by one. In this complicated case, the polices only witness is a talking parrot from the crime scene.

programme.title: Hidden Heroine
programme.desc: A drug cartel is entrenched in the Dong Zhou area. Mei Jing of the Thunderbolt Womens Commando Unit, leads her team to attack the drug base, but they are being ambushed and the identity of Meis father as an undercover is exposed. After a fierce battle, Mei and her team manage to successfully defeat the drug cartel and rescue her father.

programme.title: Enter the Fat Dragon
programme.desc: Donnie Yen plays a Hong Kong police officer who is highly skilled in martial arts but balloons to more than 200 pounds after his fianc left him. His boss can only assign simple tasks to him like escorting a criminal to Japan, but can he complete it?

programme.title: PTU
programme.desc: When OCTB (Organized Crime And Triad Bureau) officer, Sergeant Lo Sa, loses his police revolver to four triad young thugs, he seeks help from Sergeant Mike Ho of the PTU (Police Tactical Unit) to find his lost revolver. Ho and his patrolling PTU team has until dawn to recover the gun and clean up the mess.

programme.title: Mad Fate
programme.desc: A Master fortune teller predicts that Tung, a born psychopath, will be imprisoned for murder and tries to change his fate. A veteran detective believes Tung is a psychopathic serial killer after witnessing him kill a cat, and pursues him relentlessly. Can the Master change Tungs mad fate?

programme.title: Bounty Hunters
programme.desc: A group of bounty hunters, including San, Yo, Cat, Swan and Bobo, are tasked to track down the culprit of a series of bombings that have plagued an international hotel group. Unfortunately, Swan, Cat and Bobo are kidnapped by the mastermind of the bombings. Can San and Yo save them? Will the bounty hunters accomplish their mission?

programme.title: Wu Kong
programme.desc: Set 500 years before the Monkey King Wu Kong wreaks havoc in the heavenly kingdom, the movie tells the story of how Wu Kong who, unwilling to bow to his own destiny, sets out to rebel against the gods.

programme.title: Echoes of the Thunder
programme.desc: Two half-brothers, Nam and Fire, are top racing drivers. In a racing challenge with Japanese driver Kenji, Nam causes a young racing driver to be seriously injured and is depressed. Fire stands up for Nam and decides to compete with Kenji in an illegal street car race. Who will win the race? Can Nam finally bounce back?

programme.title: The Lady Iron Chef
programme.desc: Beer girl and part-time model Ceci has terrible cooking skills. Coming from a well-off family that owns a big culinary business, wealthy SK meets Ceci in a gourmet competition held by his family's company. Despite their different backgrounds, Ceci and SK fall for each other. However, SK's dominating mother disapproves of their relationship. To win over her future mother-in-law, Ceci must beat her rival Jade in a gourmet showdown

programme.title: Crypto Storm
programme.desc: ICAC investigation officer Lok sets up a special team to investigate a corruption case involving a banks top executives use of cryptocurrency to manipulate the trading market. When the banks chairman is kidnapped and kidnappers demand ransom in crypto coins, Lok connects the dots and vows to hunt down the mastermind behind both crimes.

programme.title: Flashover
programme.desc: This is based on a true story. A sudden earthquake hits the gas pipes in an industrial park, triggering massive explosions and engulfing the neighboring area in flames. When the Fire Rescue Force reaches the scene, firefighters must fight against the flames and time, as they commit to safeguard lives with their own.

programme.title: The Shadow Boxing
programme.desc: Chan and his apprentice Fan transport vampires for a living. In their most recent job, they are hired to transport nine zombies at one go. When two of them hopped away, it is revealed that one of them is actually a man in disguise trying to escape from his enemies. It turns out that the fake zombie and Chan are both martial arts experts!

programme.title: Perils Of The Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: The titanic team of Director Chu Yuan and Novelist Ku Lung chose to give their hero (Ti Lung) a whole new cliffhanger-fraught adventure featuring a mysterious swordsman, a sensual swordswoman, an imperial assassin, a ghost mansion, a booby-trapped tunnel, as well as double crosses and secret missions.

programme.title: Hex Vs Witchcraft
programme.desc: A compulsive gambler with bad luck owes money to a violent gangster boss and trades his wife as down payment, causing her to leave him. As he decides to kill himself, a mysterious old man offers him a proposal to marry the ghost of his dead daughter in exchange for cash and an expensive apartment.

programme.title: Ambitious Kung Fu Girl
programme.desc: The lovely Michelle Mei Suet plays a spoiled girl Szu-szu who ignores her true love Yang Fan to go off in search of a swordsman Chin Ko she idolizes. The search sets off one great action scene after another, until she's threatened to be sold into slavery but Yang Fan arrives in the nick of time! This amusing and entertaining variation on the standard kung-fu film is definitely a winner.

programme.title: Guess Who Killed My Twelve Lovers?
programme.desc: Jenny Hu, Shaw Brothers' gorgeous Chinese-German star, was given her first comedy role in the wild and wacky Guess Who Killed My Twelve Lovers? Described as "a comedy of belly laughs and chilling murders", it is a unique entry in the Hong Kong theater of the absurd.

programme.title: Return of the One-armed Swordsman
programme.desc: One-armed Swordsman Fang Kang wants to lead a quiet life with his wife, but when she is abducted by the Eight Demon Swordsmen clan, he is forced to take them on in order to save her.

programme.title: Spring Blossoms
programme.desc: Some of Shaw Brothers' biggest female stars of the 1970s share the screen in this tale of young love and interfering parents, starring Lily Li, Shu Pei Pei and Essie Lin Chia.

programme.title: Gang Master
programme.desc: This is a story about an army out to destroy the Hsien Lung gang of anti-Yuan revolutionaries. Their leader Ru Yi Tu is up against Fu Zhong Yuan, the identified successor of the Hsien Lung gang who must also prove his own legitimacy. The plot thickens with murder, sibling rivalry and shocking discoveries that could change the course of history.

programme.title: The Blue and the Black Part 2
programme.desc: Continuing from the first movie, Tang Qi ends her career as a nightclub singer and starts searching battle-scarred China for her lover Chang, who is now entangled with Japanese invaders, communist insurgents, and a warlord's beautiful daughter.

programme.title: Operation Lipstick
programme.desc: A professors assistant stole a micro-film storing the secret of a newly invented nuclear reactor and sells it to a crime syndicate. However, the micro-film accidentally falls into the hands of a nightclub dancer and a thief in the process, leading to them being relentlessly pursued by the crime syndicate to retrieve the micro-film.

programme.title: Legendary Weapons of China
programme.desc: Lei Kung, the leader of the Boxer Clan in Yunnan, dissolves the clan to save his disciples before going into self-exile. The Clan sends various assassins to kill him but failed. They then assigned Kungs brother Yong to find and kill Kung, leading to a battle between the two brothers.

programme.title: Pale Passion
programme.desc: Fa is an obsessive man who loves his wife Ah Hsia but is easily jealous and abuses her. When she leaves him one day, Fa hooks up with another woman, Hsing. A deadly triangle develops when Fa runs into Ah Hsia again and decides to win her back

programme.title: Five Superfighters
programme.desc: A kung fu master and his three students lost everything after they are floored by a bully. To take revenge, the students find ways to learn from other kung fu masters and come back six months later to have a rematch with the bully on their masters birthday.

programme.title: Song Of Orchid Island
programme.desc: Dr. He moves to the remote Lanyu island off the coast of Taiwan to look for his long lost father, and starts to run a clinic curing islanders who are bitten by the fatal red worms there. He meets Ya Lan who works as a nurse in his clinic and falls in love with him. Things get vicious for Dr. He as a jealous islander plots to get rid of him

programme.title: Shaolin Mantis
programme.desc: The Emperor orders Feng to find proofs of Master Tians rebellion in his house. Feng falls in love with Tians granddaughter and marries her. When he finds the proofs and tries to leave with her, his wife is killed in the fight against Tian. Feng creates the mantis-style martial arts and vows to avenge her death.

programme.title: River of Tears
programme.desc: Retired singer Fang lives happily with her husband and son. Tragedy happens when a man from her past returns to haunt her. In an ensuing struggle to free her from his clutches, her husband dies in a car accident. Blamed by her father-in-law for her husbands death, Fang gets chased out of the house and goes back to singing to make a living...

programme.title: Heroes of the East
programme.desc: A Chinese man marries a Japanese woman through an arranged marriage and manages to insult all of her Japanese martial arts family by issuing a challenge to her that is misinterpreted by the others. He must then prove how good Chinese Kung Fu really is through a series of duels with the seven Japanese martial artists who come to meet the challenge!

programme.title: Forever And Ever
programme.desc: Ivy Ling Po plays a young scholar who is manipulated into marrying a nobleman's reluctant daughter. After marrying, he soon discovers the reason for her hesitation. She is stricken with a contagious disease. But, with the power of true love, their romance prevails.

programme.title: The Magnificent Trio
programme.desc: A group of farmers who are being oppressed by the local magistrates kidnap one of the magistrates daughter in the hope of being heard by the authorities. A wandering swordsman offers his help and aiding him are two fighters who have both switched sides from being the oppressors to the oppressed. The trio fight back against the magistrates!

programme.title: The Human Goddess
programme.desc: This is a love story between an alluring fairy, Seventh Sister, who comes down from heaven to experience life in 70s Hong Kong, and a man who is running a debt laden orphanage. A heartless tycoon plans to take over the orphanage for its land but has to deal with Seventh Sisters magical powers as she aims to protect it from falling into his hands!

programme.title: Raw Courage
programme.desc: After the Ming Emperor is overthrown and his infant son was put in the care of the Black Dragon Society, a traitorous martial arts clan attacks the society, forcing an inexperienced pair of swordsman and swordswoman to flee with the infant. Their journey to deliver the infant to safety is filled with dangers that would require help from other allies

programme.title: Asia-pol
programme.desc: Asiapol agent Yang Ming Xuan trails a shipment of contraband gold being delivered to gang leader, George Eaton. He enlists the help of a Chinese woman who is trying to avenge her sister and narrowly escapes several deadly traps as he closes in on Eaton's location. This spy film is loosely inspired by the James Bond movies.

programme.title: The Twin Swords
programme.desc: Gui Wu and his wife Gan Lian Zhu are the famous Twin Swords in the martial arts world. One day, they stumble upon a kidnapping plot at the Red Lotus Temple and Lian Zhu is held captive. Wu successfully escapes to find the Gan family for help, not knowing that he is sending them into an ambush by the kidnappers. Can he finally save Lian Zhu?

programme.title: The 82 Tenants
programme.desc: Continuing the success of the classic comedy House of 72 tenants, this sequel tells the stories of tenants living in an old building in Hong Kong who are forced to evict by the developers. Some tenants prefer to take the compensation while some resist the move. Will the acquisitions plan destroy the harmony of the neighborhood?

programme.title: The Happiest Moment
programme.desc: This erotic comedy anthology features three stories about an old man who dies from an overdose of virility pills, a cop who goes on the run after extorting money from a hooker, and a barber's apprentice who encounters a lively corpse in a night vigil. Through playing all these characters, Michael Hui proves himself as a genius of Hong Kong comedy.

programme.title: The Lark
programme.desc: Sixties pop star Carrie Ku plays the "Little Lark" in this romantic-drama of mistaken identity that is a treasure trove of some of the most popular Mandarin songs of all time.

programme.title: The Hidden Power Of Dragon Sabre
programme.desc: Defeated villain Sung Ching Shu returns and starts a reign of terror, trapping a beautiful Mongolian Princess and mastering the "yin and yang combination" to become almost invincible. Only two swords held by two great swordsmen can stand in his way!

programme.title: The Yellow Muffler
programme.desc: Japanese director Inoue Umetsugu takes on the glitzy world of nightclub performers in The Yellow Muffler. The film depicts the struggle of two singing sisters, Ching-ping (Irene Chen I-ling) and Pai-hung (Betty Ting Pei) and ends when they are cast in a new movie.

programme.title: Return to the 36th Chamber
programme.desc: The second film of the trilogy, Gordon Liu plays Zhou Ren Jie, a man who impersonates a monk in order to learn kung fu in Shaolin, and eventually creates his own Shaolin style of scaffolding kung fu.

programme.title: Fast Fingers
programme.desc: After his release from prison, Uncle Bill returns to make a fortune with his past thieving partners. They continue to prey on the unsuspecting public, but are closely watched by the upright police chief, who happens to be the boyfriend of one of Uncle Bills nieces!

programme.title: The Lady is the Boss
programme.desc: Wong Hsia Yuan is a traditional kung fu master whose academy is on the brink of closure. Chan Mei Ling arrives from U.S. to revitalize the academy but her way of recruiting students is going beyond questionably legal. Yuan is furious, but when the local triads enter the picture, Yuan and Ling join hands to take back the neighborhood.

programme.title: Passing Flickers
programme.desc: This film is an amusing insiders look at the Hong Kong film industry and is based on Director Li Han Hsiangs popular newspaper column recounting his work at Shaw Brothers. The collection of some of his funniest and most surreal film musings of the era, filled with behind-the-scene asides, this is a must-see for any Hong Kong cinema aficionado!

programme.title: Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre 2
programme.desc: Only by bringing together the powerful Heaven Sword and the mighty Dragon Sabre can six martial arts sects struggling for supremacy be saved in this thrilling sequel to Chu Yuan's original hit.

programme.title: Gossip Street
programme.desc: All neighbours gather to gossip in flat number 8 on the second floor of the Gossip Street apartment building! Most of the residents are common people from all walks of life and there is never a lack of laughter or sarcasm in the neighbourhood. However, when a local mobster wants to change the place into a gambling den, things get serious...

programme.title: The Weird Man
programme.desc: During the Three Kingdoms period, a Taoist priest Yu Ji cures many patients with his supernatural powers and is loved by the people. However, the arrogant general Sun Che thinks that Yu Ji bewitches people and orders for him to be beheaded. Subsequently, the spirit of the Yu Ji rises from his dead body and takes revenge on Sun Che.

programme.desc: Arch-enemies drop their guard to team up against a new threat. Then, it's back to the future when Desert Dan risks all on a tire and a hunch. And later, blades are drawn, fragile alliances crumble, and the buyers let nothing stand in the way of winning big.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 3
programme.desc: Jesse knows you don't strike it rich if you play it safe, so he gambles big on a risky bin. Then, Lori defies her husband Brandon and buys a questionable unit. Will her bold move lead to a dynasty or divorce? And later, lightning erupts when the buyers battle it out for a puzzle of parts they hope will add up to one smooth ride.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 4
programme.desc: Big money brings out fierce competition at a rare high-stakes RV auction. Then, the contents of a locker spill out at our bidders' feet, smashing several dangerous objects. Will it bring seven years of bad luck, or a 7-figure payday? And later, Jesse's experience with antiques makes him think treasures lie behind the iron curtain.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 5
programme.desc: A deadly bin puts all the buyers on edge. It's a bad omen that casts a dark shadow over the day. As the day winds to a fever pitch, Brandon and Lori square off against Scott and Chrissy in a do or die bidding war that sends all strategy out the window. And later, our competitors uncover a high-tech find they think could worth thousands. But all that glitters may not be gold.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon S2 01
programme.desc: In the season two premiere, Murtaugh (DAMON WAYANS) follows Riggs (CLAYNE CRAWFORD) down to Mexico, where he plans to avenge his wife's death once and for all.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon S2 02
programme.desc: While Riggs & Murtaugh investigate an illegal drug ring run out a wellness clinic, things heat up when DEA Agent Karen Palmer competes with Riggs to solve the case first.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon S2 03
programme.desc: When Riggs & Murtaugh investigate the mysterious death of the bodyguard of a famous singer (JOJO), Murtaugh turns to his daughter to learn more about possible suspects.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon S2 04
programme.desc: Investigating an in-flight robbery, Riggs & Murtaugh hunt for an unreliable father whose daughter is their main witness.Meanwhile, Murtaugh faces hostility from his own daughter.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon S2 05
programme.desc: Investigating the murder of a winner of a horse race, Riggs and Murtaugh are aided in the investigation by Leo Getz (THOMAS LENNON) who insists it's a homicide.

programme.desc: Michael turns leftovers into beauty products at a soap shop, and at a record store, he shows a hip-hop fan how to jump around. Plus, at a children's store, Michael's co-worker learns about the dangers of babysitting.

programme.desc: Michael shocks a receptionist with a medical procedure that leaves both their jaws on the floor, and then at a party store, Michael reveals a regenerating piece of gum. Plus, an electrifying trick rewrites history.

programme.title: The Irrational Ep1
programme.desc: Pilot - Professor of behavioral science Alec Mercer is called upon to investigate the murder of a fashion influencer whose boyfriend, a decorated soldier and son of a Senator, has confessed to the crime. Mercer suspects there is more to the story than meets the eye.

programme.title: The Irrational Ep2
programme.desc: Dead Woman Walking - Alec is approached by his old friend CJ, a prominent investigative journalist, who asks for his help after she is poisoned with rare and deadly nerve agent. With time running out, Mercer pieces together scant clues.

programme.title: The Irrational Ep3
programme.desc: The Barnum Effect - After a passenger plane crashes into the Potomac, suspicions focus immediately on the pilot. Alec and the team are asked to investigate the pilots personal motivations and piece together clues in the hopes of revealing the truth.

programme.title: The Irrational Ep4
programme.desc: Zero Sum - Alec and the team take on a kidnapping case at the request of a desperate father. Their investigation is hampered by a complicated family dynamic that slowly reveals everyones hidden motivations.

programme.title: The Irrational Ep5
programme.desc: Lucky Charms - Alec and the team head to Las Vegas to help Camille, a former colleague turned expert poker player whos been lured into danger. They must take some risks to solve a gambling mystery before Camille gets hurt. Marisa makes a significant discovery.

programme.title: The Irrational Ep6
programme.desc: Point And Shoot - Alec agrees to testify as an expert witness in a wrongful death trial for a friend of Kylies. As he faces an old nemesis, he discovers competing emotions around an accidental shooting. Marisa reaches a decision about the bombing investigation.

programme.title: The Irrational Ep7
programme.desc: The Real Deal - Alecs first date with Rose turns into a 24-hour excursion when they find themselves taking on an investigation involving a forged masterpiece. Marisa and Kylie attempt to revive their friendship, which has faltered since Alec and Marisas divorce.

programme.title: The Irrational Ep8
programme.desc: Scorched Earth - Alec takes a case involving a young burn victim and arson that forces him to confront some trauma from his past. Phoebe and Rizwan compete for an important research grant.

programme.title: The Irrational Ep9
programme.desc: Cheating Life - Alec Mercer, a world-renowned professor of behavioral science, lends his expertise to an array of high-stakes cases with his unique and unexpected approach to understanding human behavior.

programme.title: The Irrational Ep10
programme.desc: Bombshell - Alec Mercer, a world-renowned professor of behavioral science, lends his expertise to an array of high-stakes cases with his unique and unexpected approach to understanding human behavior.

programme.title: The Irrational Ep11
programme.desc: Reciprocity - Alec Mercer, a world-renowned professor of behavioral science, lends his expertise to an array of high-stakes cases with his unique and unexpected approach to understanding human behavior.

programme.desc: Enter a universe where more than one wears the mask.

programme.title: Bangkok Dangerous

programme.title: Legion

programme.title: Takers

Academy Award Winner Kevin Spacey and young Hollywood super star Kate Boswoth star in this clever & adreniline filled heist film. An MIT math whiz is recruited by a teacher to join a specialized team of card counters.

programme.title: Elysium
programme.desc: In the year 2154, two classes of people exist: the very wealthy, who live on a pristine man-made space station called Elysium, and the rest, who live on an overpopulated, ruined Earth.

programme.desc: Cordoba and the Costa del Sol - Michael visits the ancient city of Cordoba and the Costa del Sol.

programme.title: Wilderness with Simon Reeve S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Congo - Simon Reeve battles his way across the Congo, braving thick jungle and tropical swamps in search of the people and the wildlife who make their home in Africa's greatest rainforest.

programme.title: Exploration Volcano S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Smoker - Mount Nyiragongo in the Democratic Republic of Congo erupts. It engulfs the nearby city of Goma with lava, taking thirty-three lives and destroying almost four-thousand homes. Chris arrives in Goma to find everyone else evacuating. After surveying the destruction, Chris joins volcanologists on an expedition to the source of the eruption.

programme.title: Extreme Treks S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Xinjiang - The Taklamakan Desert - Hundreds of years ago one of the major challenges to traders along the Silk Road was the deadly Taklamakan Desert. Join Ryan has he takes a journey deep in to the remote desert, where endless waves of sand stretch far in to the horizon in every direction.

programme.title: Robson Green Grand Slam Fishing S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Seward - Robson travels to Seward, Alaska, where he must catch three species of fish from a set list in a single day, but first he trains in Homer where the halibut are enormous!

programme.title: Seven Worlds, One Planet S1 Ep3
programme.desc: South America - The latest series from the BBC and Sir David Attenborough explores the continent of South America - the most species-rich continent on Earth.

programme.title: Portillo's Andalucia S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Cordoba and the Costa del Sol - Michael visits the ancient city of Cordoba and the Costa del Sol.

programme.title: Wild Oman: Wonder of Arabia S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Sultanate of Oman is Arabia's most remarkable treasure. It is a land of surprising beauty filled with unexpected natural wonders, home to some of the rarest animals on Earth - the Arabian Leopard, Arabian Oryx, Green and Hawksbill Turtles - and many more creatures including Arabian Fox, Striped Hyena, Whale Sharks and other sea creatures. Oman's landscape is as diverse as the variety of unique creatures that it supports.

programme.title: How Did They Build That? S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Discover the secrets of the New York skyscraper that defies the laws of physics to stay standing; and the thousand foot elevator built on the side of a Chinese mountain.

programme.title: Inside the Factory S8 Ep4
programme.desc: Stuffed Pasta - Gregg Wallace explores the Dell Ugo factory in Hertfordshire to reveal how it makes 500 million stuffed pasta parcels annually. He's following the production of crab and crayfish raviolo, one of their best sellers.

programme.desc: South America - The latest series from the BBC and Sir David Attenborough explores the continent of South America - the most species-rich continent on Earth.

programme.title: Seven Worlds, One Planet S1 Ep3
programme.desc: South America - The latest series from the BBC and Sir David Attenborough explores the continent of South America - the most species-rich continent on Earth.

programme.title: Inside the Factory S8 Ep5
programme.desc: Stout - Gregg Wallace explores the secrets of the Guinness brewery in Dublin to reveal how it makes two million litres of Irish stout every single day. Plus, Cherry Healey visits a water treatment centre.

programme.title: Frozen Planet II S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Frozen Peaks - Frozen Planet returns with a spellbinding journey through magical icy lands.

programme.title: The Last Overland S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Best Laid Plans - Meet 87 year old Tim Slessor, the British adventurer plotting his last great adventure: recreating his epic 1955 expedition - 'First Overland: London to Singapore' - which a young David Attenborough commissioned for the BBC.

programme.title: Drowning In Plastic S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Liz learns that the world's rivers have been transporting 50 per cent of all plastic that arrives in our seas. She also looks at whether scientists have found solutions.

programme.title: Robson Green's Fishing Coast to Coast S1 Ep1
programme.desc: South West of England - Robson travels around the South West of England as he seeks the Conger Eel.

programme.title: Rewilding 1 - Andalucia's Struggle Ep3
programme.desc: Investigate the animals that have been returned to this mosaic of extreme habitats in Spain. Then discover how small environmental changes can make big differences in the populations of many endangered species and give them a real chance to recover.

programme.title: How the Wild Things Sleep
programme.desc: Tap into one of the least understood areas of animal science: sleep. Check out adaptations made by the most extreme snoozers on Earth, from tiny bees who doze for 20 hours a day to enormous elephants who survive on just two precious hours of rest.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 - Frida the Jaguar Cub Ep1
programme.desc: Test limits with jaguar cub Frida, whos honing her survival skills in Brazils Caiman Lodge Reserve. Learn how to sneak with mum Gatuna, see sister Anouk help her hide from hungry interlopers, and go on a reckless solo trek that takes a lucky turn.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 - Lola the Sea Lion Pup Ep2
programme.desc: Watch sea lion Lola take her first chaotic steps into a macho battlefield on Argentinas coast. Cheer as this baby learns key vocal and swimming skills, fights to stay by mom Marias side, and makes a lightning-fast escape from the jaws of death.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 - Dora the Baby Muriqui Ep3
programme.desc: Feel the enchantment of Brazils Atlantic Forest as southern muriqui Dora takes her first steps away from mum Mimi. Get lessons in spider monkey troop dynamics, bone up on tail-hanging technique, and see this baby find her place among her peers.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 - Thiago the Coati Kitten Ep4
programme.desc: Set a course for adventure with Thiago, a brave baby coati. Find out how this raccoon-like fellow sharpens his sniffing and foraging skills, crosses suburban roads near his lush Brazilian forest home, and avoids inanimate and four-legged dangers.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 3 - Hard Lessons Ep3
programme.desc: Shudder as food-obsessed Beni gets a dramatic, educational smackdown from the local dominant male, Petruk. See spoiled rich kid Spanser, a former illegal pet, try to tamp down his sweet tooth before roguish Bumi goes on a wild joyride with Greta.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 3 - Outbreak Alert Ep4
programme.desc: Race to contain a case of malaria brought in by orphaned infant Cesia, then assess surrogate mum Sris plan to help Bumi. See the positive influence of Daput, a wild orangutan mum, on the college females before a shocking thief raids the food store.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 3 - Absent Friends Ep5
programme.desc: Hunt for missing nursery-class orphan Lahei and see shy Rumba try her weak left hand in a nest-building session. Watch younger Delilah school Bumi in class, then find out if Beni and Valentino will make the grade and finally earn their freedom.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 - Start of Trauma Season Ep1
programme.desc: Scramble as the ER team tends to a spring flood of patients. Watch vet Phil stabilize an ailing joey as the rescue team fends off a rude kangaroo. Shadow senior vet Tim, who treats a cat-scratched bandicoot and snakes a keelback out of a grate.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 - Operation Pelican Ep2
programme.desc: Head out with rescuer Jo to scoop up a pelican whos swallowed a fish hook, then see Sam free a newborn bat tangled in a fence. Follow vet Tim, who aids a surly koala with an eye infection, and watch a lumpy python give newbie Ruby a load of trouble.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 - Gutsy Koala Ep3
programme.desc: Shadow vet Bec, who patches up dog-bitten koala Rachel, and new vets Ruby and Kerryn, who soothe a pack of itchy possums. Free a pair of kookaburras trapped in a wall with rescue officer Dani and watch vet Tims squirrel glider knee surgery.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 3 - Hard Lessons Ep3
programme.desc: Shudder as food-obsessed Beni gets a dramatic, educational smackdown from the local dominant male, Petruk. See spoiled rich kid Spanser, a former illegal pet, try to tamp down his sweet tooth before roguish Bumi goes on a wild joyride with Greta.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 3 - Outbreak Alert Ep4
programme.desc: Race to contain a case of malaria brought in by orphaned infant Cesia, then assess surrogate mum Sris plan to help Bumi. See the positive influence of Daput, a wild orangutan mum, on the college females before a shocking thief raids the food store.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 3 - Absent Friends Ep5
programme.desc: Hunt for missing nursery-class orphan Lahei and see shy Rumba try her weak left hand in a nest-building session. Watch younger Delilah school Bumi in class, then find out if Beni and Valentino will make the grade and finally earn their freedom.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 - Start of Trauma Season Ep1
programme.desc: Scramble as the ER team tends to a spring flood of patients. Watch vet Phil stabilize an ailing joey as the rescue team fends off a rude kangaroo. Shadow senior vet Tim, who treats a cat-scratched bandicoot and snakes a keelback out of a grate.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 - Operation Pelican Ep2
programme.desc: Head out with rescuer Jo to scoop up a pelican whos swallowed a fish hook, then see Sam free a newborn bat tangled in a fence. Follow vet Tim, who aids a surly koala with an eye infection, and watch a lumpy python give newbie Ruby a load of trouble.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 - Gutsy Koala Ep3
programme.desc: Shadow vet Bec, who patches up dog-bitten koala Rachel, and new vets Ruby and Kerryn, who soothe a pack of itchy possums. Free a pair of kookaburras trapped in a wall with rescue officer Dani and watch vet Tims squirrel glider knee surgery.

programme.title: Africa's Claws & Jaws 1 - Lethal By Design Ep2
programme.desc: Snakes, spiders and scorpions: these creepy crawlies are the animals we connect with least and fear most. While its true they have some of the most venomous creatures in the world within their ranks, what is less commonly accepted is that they are often more scared of us then we are of them.

programme.title: Africa's Claws & Jaws 1 - Living with Sharks Ep3
programme.desc: Sharks are among the planets oldest and most highly evolved predators. Along southern Africas coast, pioneers dedicate their lives to learning more about these creatures, and spreading awareness about their plight. These people do all they can to find safe ways of living with sharks.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 3 - Arc of Baringo Ep2
programme.desc: Ol Pejeta must help move eight giraffes to a newly opened wildlife area on an island several hundred kilometers away. How do you move the tallest animals on the planet?

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 1 - Elephant Valley Ep1
programme.desc: Follow a family of elephants from sunrise to sunset as they are joined by a cast of characters in a valley that is bursting with life. But in the dry season temperatures soar and drought grips the land.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 1 - Wild Heaveyweights Ep2
programme.desc: In Zambias Luangwa Valley some of the largest animals on Earth live side by side. Discover how each of these giants uses ingenious strategies and amazing adaptations, honed over millions of years, to survive-and thrive.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 1 - Life and Death on the Plains Ep3
programme.desc: Liuwa Plains is a remote grassland and one of Africas last wild places. Only the toughest of Africas wildlife can survive here. Witness an extraordinary story of perseverance, adaptation, and survival in this extreme habitat.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 1 - Hippo River Ep4
programme.desc: The Luangwa River is a lifeline for animals-and home to the worlds largest concentration of hippos. See how these hippos spend their days dealing with heat, insects, and threats from their fellow river-dwellers.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 1 - The River Troop Ep5
programme.desc: Along the bank of the Luangwa River in Zambia lives a large troop of baboons. Despite the difficulties of the dry season, baby baboons are born. This is the story of a young male baboon who faces difficult choices as he comes of age.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 1 - Pride Lands Ep6
programme.desc: Spend one day and one night in Zambias Luangwa Valley with Africas most fearsome hunters-a pride of lions. The lions are hungry because they havent managed to make a large kill in days and tempers are starting to flare.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 1 - The Wild Web Ep7
programme.desc: In Zambia, no single creature survives in isolation. From lions and leopards to jumping spiders and bee-eating mantises, study the diverse network of animals and plants that makes the Luangwa Valley one of the most magical wildernesses in Africa.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 - Into the Heat Ep1
programme.desc: Meet the unlikely collaborators working to ensure mutual survival in the Kalahari Basin. Learn of an elephant clans symbiotic link to fruiting anaboom trees, a meerkats alliance with a feisty drongo bird, and more flora-and-fauna odd couples.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 - Pushed to the Limits Ep2
programme.desc: Thirst for rain alongside the animals of the Kalahari, as they endure a brutally dry year. Witness co-operation between elephant herds in their desperate search for water and meet a meerkats strange babysitter, who helps the next generation survive.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 - Behind the Lens Ep3
programme.desc: Track scientists who have arrived in the Kalahari to test a hypothesis: that animal collaboration is the key to the dizzying diversity of the regions species. Observe as they monitor behavior, decipher data, and deliver fascinating conclusions.

programme.title: Surviving the Amazon 1 - Jungle Killers Ep1
programme.desc: A jaguar stalks the riverbank. A venomous snake is on the move. A Colombian tarantula waits for night fall. Watch as these fierce predators prowl through the jungle and bite into their next great meal.

programme.title: Surviving the Amazon 1 - Jungle Love Ep2
programme.desc: Its not easy to fall in love in the jungle. Find out how these animals turn to strategic mating strategies in order to pass on their genes. Meet monkeys who like monogamy, a bird who rivals Casanova, and a spider wholl risk his life for love.

programme.title: Osprey: Sea Raptor
programme.desc: Wade into a saltwater marsh along the Connecticut River to witness the heartwarming reunion of two ospreys whove been mates for a decade. Witness their highs and lows over a single summer as they raise their chicks and dodge a host of predators.

programme.title: The Ocean's Greatest Feast
programme.desc: Get a front-row seat to the planets biggest biomass migration, the annual 1,000-mile sardine run along South Africas east coast. See billions of these tiny fish run a gauntlet of hungry predators, including stealthy seals and dive-bombing gannets.

programme.title: Super Shark Highway 1 - Food, Glorious Food Ep1
programme.desc: Embark on a dangerous tagging mission in South Australia that will show what sharks eat and why they gather in feeding hot spots. Then head north as a team chases tiger, bull, and hammerhead sharks and outfits one with a 360-degree dorsal camera.

programme.title: Shark Squad 1 - Island of the White Shark Ep1
programme.desc: Off Guadalupe Island, Mexico, top shark ecologist Mauricio Hoyos attempts a television first. Get a unique view as he attaches a camera to the dorsal fin of a great white, revealing how it swims, hunts, and ultimately strikes its prey.

programme.title: Shark Squad 1 - Bimini Sharklab Ep2
programme.desc: Travel to a remote part of the Bahamas to unlock shark secrets. Do they make friends? Where do they give birth? Are some bolder than others? The answers may help protect these supreme predators for generations to come.

programme.title: Shark Squad 1 - Chasing Mako Ep3
programme.desc: In some of the most-remote regions on the planet, researchers dive deep and brave danger to unlock secret shark behaviours, challenge myths about sharks, and fight for the protection of these supreme predators before its too late.

programme.title: Osprey: Sea Raptor
programme.desc: Wade into a saltwater marsh along the Connecticut River to witness the heartwarming reunion of two ospreys whove been mates for a decade. Witness their highs and lows over a single summer as they raise their chicks and dodge a host of predators.

programme.desc: In some of the most-remote regions on the planet, researchers dive deep and brave danger to unlock secret shark behaviours, challenge myths about sharks, and fight for the protection of these supreme predators before its too late.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 1 - Wild Heaveyweights Ep2
programme.desc: In Zambias Luangwa Valley some of the largest animals on Earth live side by side. Discover how each of these giants uses ingenious strategies and amazing adaptations, honed over millions of years, to survive-and thrive.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 1 - Life and Death on the Plains Ep3
programme.desc: Liuwa Plains is a remote grassland and one of Africas last wild places. Only the toughest of Africas wildlife can survive here. Witness an extraordinary story of perseverance, adaptation, and survival in this extreme habitat.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 3 - Flight of the Pachyderms Ep3
programme.desc: The vets encounter a difficult predicament when a large elephant wanders off and ends up in a local village in an agitated state. If they cant find a helicopter to help with herding immediately, they will have to have the elephant shot.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - Home Away from Home Ep2
programme.desc: Swim upriver with the Bay Family, where Anna offers a hand raising her grandpups before heading home to find interlopers on her turf. Watch a flood in the mangroves nearly sweep away a baby, and see the Townies eat clean through their resources.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - A Busy Bay Ep3
programme.desc: Get ready to rumble in Marina Bay, where the Nomads and Townies are squatting while Anna and the Bay Family are away upriver. Soak up the peaceful otter life in this luxurious waterway before the surprise early return of its rightful owners.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 3 - Outbreak Alert Ep4
programme.desc: Race to contain a case of malaria brought in by orphaned infant Cesia, then assess surrogate mum Sris plan to help Bumi. See the positive influence of Daput, a wild orangutan mum, on the college females before a shocking thief raids the food store.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Pacific Islands: Commotion in the Ocean Ep5
programme.desc: Live through a sunny tropical September day with creatures from Polynesia to the Indonesian archipelago. See how the sun affects the movement, feeding habits, and mating rituals of everything from tiny zooplankton to whale sharks.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Australian Spring Fever Ep6
programme.desc: Celebrate the first day of spring with Aussie creatures looking for either a dinner or a date. From the kangaroos in the grasslands to the koalas in the trees to the freshwater crocodiles, they hunt for food or fight for breeding rights.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 - Rio the Giant River Otter Pup Ep5
programme.desc: Visit the last stronghold of the giant river otter in Brazils beautiful Pantanal wetland. Track pup Rio and his siblings as they test the waters, team up to evade a jaguar ambush, and become a cohesive family unit that hunts and thrives together.

programme.title: Surviving the Amazon 1 - A Life Among Trees Ep3
programme.desc: How many trees can you find in the Amazon? And whats it like to live up in them? Travel through the canopy and see how more than 1200 species of trees coexist. Plus, follow monkeys and other creatures who call these trees home.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - Home Away from Home Ep2
programme.desc: Swim upriver with the Bay Family, where Anna offers a hand raising her grandpups before heading home to find interlopers on her turf. Watch a flood in the mangroves nearly sweep away a baby, and see the Townies eat clean through their resources.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Australian Spring Fever Ep6

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep25
programme.desc: The Case Of The Rules Of The Game - Pat Pat and the pirates have fallen out over who has won board game and as they've lost the rules they can't agree. They both think they are the winner and refuse to talk to one another. Noddy needs to find the missing rules or they might never be friends again! Noddy launches his investigation and asking the who, what, where, when, why and how questions he follows the clues and eventually finds the rules in Smartysaurus's dinolab. They were blown there by the wind from the Daisy Mill at the farm. Now the pirates and Pat-Pat can agree on who has won the game and are friends again. Good job, Noddy!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep78
programme.desc: Dingaling Poppy - Poppy has got a new trike to do her deliveries on. But she doesn't know how to ride it properly and keeps crashing into things. The tots take matters into hand and help Poppy learn to ride her trike safely

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep26
programme.desc: The Case Of Smartysaurus's Rainbow Experiment - Noddy's back on the case when something goes wrong with Smartysaurus's rainbow experiment . He needs to investigate. He figures out that the rainbow colours have all been put in a different order. Using his investigation kit and all his who, what, why, where, when and how questions he e follows all the clues - which leads him eventually to Fuse's workshop. Fuse admits that he changed the order of the rainbow test tubes from colour to size order. He's very sorry for ruining the experiment! Noddy helps Smartysaurus reorder the colours and this time the Rainbow experiment is a huge success! Case closed!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep25

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep26

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep25
programme.desc: Why Flamingo Stands On One Leg - You see there was a time when Flamingo stood on both legs. One morning, Flamingo and her flock landed at the Water Hole when all the crabs were busy performing their underwater dance. Needless to say, all these legs where in their way! Tortoise came up with the plan that if all Crabs each nipped a flamingo leg, there will be room to share the waterhole. So from then on, Flamingo stood on one legs and Crabs were able to perform their dance in the watering hole

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep26
programme.desc: Why Woodpecker Pecks - You see there was a time when Woodpecker didn't peck. All the birds had their very own sound, but Woodpecker didn't make a sound at all. Then one very dark night in Tinga Tinga, the Moon and the Stars disappear! The animals summon the birds to tell Lion but Woodpecker can't pass the message on! Distraught, Woodpecker flies up to the skies but where are the stars?! And where is the Moon?! In desperation Woodpecker pecks at the dark sky and a star comes back, then another, then another! Everyone is delighted, no beast more than Woodpecker who now has her very own special sound pecking.

programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Senseless Torment Of The Space Toilet - Inspired by their favorite TV show, George and Harold along with Principal Krupp blast off to outer space, where an angry toilet awaits.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep43
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Abandoned Artifact Of The Absentee Aliens - After George and Harold learn the truth about their mission, Dupe Licitous enlists the entire crew in a quest to repair a rogue satellite.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep44
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Hazardous Hysteria Of The Hangry Hypnosinger - Everybody on the spaceship has been cryogenically frozen for three months everyone, that is, except Krupp, who's wide awake and happily in charge.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep60
programme.desc: Sitting Ducks - Boss, Tina, JJ, Dez and Pip willfully get babysat by the Uncuddleables, planning to expose them as horrible sitters via secret, hidden cameras. But the plan is thrown for a loop when Tina's first night alone without her parents makes her fall for their sitter Mia as a "substitute mommy." Meanwhile, Nannycam uses the babysitting distraction to sneak into the Uncuddleables' secret garage hideout to gather intel with her own "B field team."

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep61
programme.desc: The Big Dumpling - The Uncuddleables have struck the Lil Dumpling baby pageant, replacing all of Baby Corp's super-cute top 5%er babies with not-cute bottom 5%ers. Boss, Tina and their field team race to caravan the 5%ers from their homes to the pageant before Nannycam deploys the nuclear option of unleashing the dangerously cute UBO on stage to salvage a Lil Dumpling win.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep62
programme.desc: The Great Medieval London Fire 1135 - Boss Baby and Tina reject the 5%er system that says the cuter you are, the more love you deserve. Teaming up with the Uncuddleables, the team tries to take down the system from within, forming a resistance of the eight department heads of Baby Corp in the hopes of changing the way we look at Baby Love forever.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep17
programme.desc: The Beast of the Wasteland - Po and the Kids are once more waylaid, this time by Mole Rats who have deemed Bao their god. But when Bao isn't able to defeat the mythical creature plaguing the Wasteland, Fan Tong steps up to save the day.

But her attempts to foster a relationship keep backfiring./Branch and Poppy try to entertain Trolls Villages babies with a series of nursery rhymes. But, stalling for time, they expand each into a distinct, Trolls-y story.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep48
programme.desc: Apple of My Ire/Funsgiving - After all their adventures, Branch no longer finds Cloud Guy as annoying as he once did. But to Cloud Guy, this is an unacceptable betrayal of their adversarial relationship. Dejected, he sets out to find a new rival to annoy./Biggie is hosting Funsgiving this year, and is therefore charged with preparing all of the best dishes for his friends. programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep49

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and accepted wisdom to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You wont find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of todays world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from Prove That Climate Change Exists to Who Will Win the Race to Space. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.
